name: Craby, the Roller
description:
Game made for Weekly Game Jam #153. The theme was "Roll" and I decided to make a simple platformer game. Tha player can control the rotation of some environment elements to explore the level.

How to start the game: Extract the game files and execute "Craby, the Roller" executable.

If you get stuck, die or cannot jump, press R to respawn, collision is still a little buggy. To close the game, press Alt+F4.

If you want a full game like this, make sure to donate any ammount! Thanks for playing :D

Special thanks:
  • Bárbara Penha for her support!
  • Daniel Ferezin for the music!
